titles: Densell Hollis esq. his speech at the delivery of the protestation to the Lords of the upper House of Parliament 4 May, 1641 wherein is set forth the reasons that moved the House of Commons to make the said protestation : together with a short narration of the severall grievances of the kingdome.
Speech at the delivery of the protestation to the Lords of the upper House of Parliament, 4 May 1641
author: Holles, Denzil Holles, Baron, 1599-1680.
notes: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Charles I, 1625-1649 --  Sources.
